name: sidebar-color
label: Sidebar Background Color
description: The background color of the main sidebar menu.

name: sidebar-text
label: Sidebar Text Color
description: The text color of the main sidebar menu. This should be in contrast to the Sidebar Background Color.

name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo to display in the upper left of the page.

name: favicon
label: Favicon
description: The page favicon image. Providing a square image is highly recommended; images that are not square will automatically be cropped square. For maximum compatibility, the image you provide should be no larger than 196 x 196 pixels.
